verses.text: \w Know|strong="G1097"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w come|strong="G1764"\w* dangerous \w times|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w Men|strong="G0444"\w* \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w lovers|strong="G5366"\w* \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1510"\w*, covetous, haughty, proud, \w blasphemers|strong="G0989"\w*, \w disobedient|strong="G0545"\w* \w to|strong="G0444"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*, \w ungrateful|strong="G0884"\w*, wicked,
\w Without|strong="G0193"\w* affection, \w without|strong="G0193"\w* peace, \w slanderers|strong="G1228"\w*, incontinent, unmerciful, \w without|strong="G0193"\w* kindness,

Traitors, stubborn, puffed up, \w and|strong="G4273"\w* \w lovers|strong="G5369"\w* \w of|strong="G2228"\w* pleasures \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w of|strong="G2228"\w* \w God|strong="G5377"\w*:

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w an|strong="G2192"\w* appearance \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1411"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w denying|strong="G0720"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* thereof. \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w avoid|strong="G0665"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* sort \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* creep \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w houses|strong="G3614"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lead|strong="G0071"\w* \w captive|strong="G0163"\w* silly \w women|strong="G1133"\w* laden \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w led|strong="G0071"\w* \w away|strong="G0071"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* divers \w desires|strong="G1939"\w*:

Ever \w learning|strong="G3129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w never|strong="G3368"\w* attaining \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G0225"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jannes|strong="G2389"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Mambres resisted \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w resist|strong="G0436"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w men|strong="G0444"\w* corrupted \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*, reprobate \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w proceed|strong="G4298"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* farther; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w folly|strong="G0454"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* manifest \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w theirs|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* thou hast fully known \w my|strong="G3877"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*, manner \w of|strong="G0026"\w* life, \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, longsuffering, \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w patience|strong="G3115"\w*,

\w Persecutions|strong="G1375"\w*, afflictions: \w such|strong="G3634"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w upon|strong="G1096"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Iconium|strong="G2430"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w*: \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w persecutions|strong="G1375"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w endured|strong="G5297"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w godly|strong="G2153"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* suffer persecution.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* seducers \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* grow \w worse|strong="G5501"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worse|strong="G5501"\w*: \w erring|strong="G4105"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* driving \w into|strong="G1909"\w* error.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w continue|strong="G3306"\w* thou \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G1161"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w learned|strong="G3129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* committed \w to|strong="G2532"\w* thee: \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w learned|strong="G3129"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* thy \w infancy|strong="G1025"\w* thou hast known \w the|strong="G3588"\w* holy scriptures, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* instruct thee \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*, \w inspired|strong="G2315"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w God|strong="G4314"\w*, \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w profitable|strong="G5624"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* teach, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* reprove, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* correct, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* instruct \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*,

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* perfect, furnished \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.
